member.param: sql pro pocatecni uroven. Muze obsahovat order by
sql pro vyber deti - musi obsahovat @par_level, kam se zobrazi level a @par_roots v podmince in - napr idparentfolder in (@par_roots)
sloupec z nadrizeneho setu, ke kteremu se vazou deti
sloupce z podrizeneho setu, ke kteremu se vaze parent

member.name: T:cz.ctgroup.isor.Frame.Db
member.summary: Represents database connections to RM and RTL system

member.name: M:cz.ctgroup.isor.Frame.Db.InitConnectionString
member.summary: Initializes connection string according to the web.config. The function is called at application startup event.

member.name: M:cz.ctgroup.isor.Frame.Db.GetConnection
member.summary: Returns database connection to RM system. Connection is stored internally on request level for further usage.

member.name: M:cz.ctgroup.isor.Frame.Db.GetConnectionRtl
member.summary: Returns database connection to RTL system. Connection is stored internally on request level for further usage.

member.name: M:cz.ctgroup.isor.Frame.Db.GetConnectionTS
member.summary: Returns database connection to TS system. Connection is stored internally on request level for further usage.

member.name: M:cz.ctgroup.isor.Frame.Db.GetConnectionDWH
member.summary: Returns database connection to DWH system. Connection is stored internally on request level for further usage.

member.name: M:cz.ctgroup.isor.Frame.Db.CloseConnection
member.summary: The function closes the database connection to RM system associated with request. Do not call it explicitly, it is called automatically at the end of request event.

member.name: M:cz.ctgroup.isor.Frame.Db.CloseConnectionRtl
member.summary: The function closes the database connection to RTL system associated with request. Do not call it explicitly, it is called automatically at the end of request event.

member.name: M:cz.ctgroup.isor.Frame.Db.CloseConnectionTS
member.summary: The function closes the database connection to TS system associated with request. Do not call it explicitly, it is called automatically at the end of request event.

member.name: M:cz.ctgroup.isor.Frame.Db.CloseConnectionDWH
member.summary: The function closes the database connection to DWH system associated with request. Do not call it explicitly, it is called automatically at the end of request event.
